Blog.post: chio lah nw leg gettin better le...think dis week mayb got match should be able to play le...long time nv play match liao. sianzZ, dnt product canot work sia...think muz redo some of the parts le...waste time again (sux morale). nvm i will not give up half way de. tml stil need to go sch...late liao go orh orh le.......zzzzzZZZZZZzzzzzzzzZZZZZZZZ

Nw very tired cos juz nw soccer training. sianz go to d field den there got pple playing match. donno they noe hw to play a not play until so lousy...even my team can win them...lolx! still muz wait until them play finish. ask they play hw long they say play a while nia...abt 90 mins. lamer sia...90 mins den play full time liao still say awhile. more lame 1 cumin up. not only dat they play the match got break abt 4 times wan (like playin basketball got 4 quaters) make us wait so long. long time nv play field no stamina liao. injured still go training nw if i walk my ankle very pain sia. anyway i enjoy playin although my ankle......

juz cum hm from sch...very suay sia 2day. on the way to the bustop waking down the stairs i twist my ankle sia...like dis oso can injuried...si bei careless sia...mayb still hvn wake up...lolx! 2day go sch take test...d test so diffcult...alot donno hw to do leh. sianzZ...nw injured wait mayb still need to go 4 soccer training cos mayb got matchy...so bo bian..............

Just reach home nia. Lousy day today again. Tired liao still stay in school until now then come back. Just now in school do my dnt...but teacher i finding not there yet cos he gone out le so must wait. then go canteen chat with friends. wait until about 3pm then he come back. waste my time sia. then go to the work shop so many people...all teachers are busy...so no one is free to help...haizZ...then sit there until the workshop close le still didnt do anything...wat a waste of my time... product going finish le still didnt complete...zhao zhi dao ...go home sleep cos raining mah good condition to sleep. then go under the rain alone...haizZ...si bei SHAQ...

HaizZ...life sux...sometimes do not know why am i living in this world. Living in such a world is so tiring. TIRED AR!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Still got DnT need to complete sia...sianz... left about 2 more weeks...futhermore every week also got test...wah lao...Now still at home slacking. Just now studying until sleep...very tiring day today.
